Question 89) Trade has knew how to extract a good benefit from the interactivity of the technological environment. The possibility of obtaining a high design of the user's interests of interests, which should bring to the last consequences the principle of supply as bait to consumerist desire, was the main one.
SANTAELLA, L. Post-human cultures and arts: from media culture to cyberculture. From a commercial point of view, the advancement of new technologies, indicated in the text, is associated with
A) Consumers' performance as production of production.
B) requirement of consumers aware of their rights.
C) direct relationship between manufacturers and consumers.
D) Individualization of advertising messages.
E) Maintenance of consumer preferences.
